title: Puffins, predators and pirates
creator_credit: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Nancy Archibald
brief_description: The picturesque biological study gives striking evidence of how as order can be a threat to an entire different species: in this case the relatively rare North Atlantic Penguin. High multiplication rate of herring gulls forces them to attack penguins homeward-bound from fishing trips to rob them of their catch.
